description: This is a shell script designed for executing network connectivity diagnostics, including ping and DNS tests, as well as handling router resets based on test outcomes and configurations.

methods.name: getCorrectiveActionState
methods.description: Retrieves the current corrective action state from system configuration.

methods.name: calcRandTimetoStartPing
methods.description: Calculates a random delay before starting ping tests to stagger network checks.

methods.name: resetRouter
methods.description: Triggers a router reboot via system command.

methods.name: resetNeeded
methods.description: Decides if the router needs to be reset based on process.

methods.name: runDNSPingTest
methods.description: Performs DNS ping test and possibly triggers corrective actions if DNS resolution fails.

methods.name: runPingTest
methods.description: Performs network ping tests to the default gateway and invokes reset if packet loss indicates failure.
